entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Puvirnituq
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
